attributes.action: Nominate John Wick, the expenses "whistleblower" for Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For his outstanding service to the British people in exposing abuses in the use of public money within parliament, we the undersigned believe that John Wick, the man responsible of exposing the corruption present within parliament, should be nominated to receive a Knighthood.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
